job_description:
GRC Analyst

Position Summary

As a GRC Analyst, you will play a pivotal role in supporting and enabling Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) operations across our cybersecurity services. Your primary focus will be to enhance risk management processes, strengthen compliance frameworks, and support strategic initiatives that drive the organization’s security posture and business resilience. You will act as a key collaborator between technical teams, business units, and executive leadership, translating compliance requirements into actionable plans.

Key Responsibilities

Governance Enablement & Strategy

  • Support the design, implementation, and continuous improvement of the organization’s GRC enablement strategy, covering tooling, workflows, reporting, and process optimization.
  • Assist in developing frameworks and controls that align with industry standards (e.g., ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, PCI-DSS).
  • Help manage the governance structure, including policy lifecycle management, compliance awareness programs, and control implementation.

Risk Management & Compliance Operations

  • Conduct risk assessments, control effectiveness reviews, and gap analyses in coordination with technical and business stakeholders.
  • Assist in managing compliance assessment requests, ensuring effective intake, tracking, and prioritization of projects.
  • Provide hands-on support for coordinating internal and external audit activities and regulatory compliance reviews.
  • Maintain comprehensive compliance dashboards, reports, and metrics to track risk status, control effectiveness, and compliance posture.

Tooling & Process Improvement

  • Assist in the selection, deployment, and management of GRC tools and technologies (e.g., Archer, ServiceNow GRC, MetricStream) to streamline risk and compliance operations.
  • Collaborate with IT and security teams to integrate automated controls and reporting into existing workflows and systems.
  • Identify opportunities for process automation, efficiency gains, and proactive risk identification.

Collaboration & Communication

  • Partner with IT, Security, Legal, and Business Units to ensure compliance activities align with business objectives.
  • Translate complex compliance and risk findings into clear, actionable insights for technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Assist in delivering training and awareness programs related to governance and compliance policies.

Required Qualifications

  • 3+ years of experience in GRC, Information Security, IT Risk, or Compliance functions.
  • Strong understanding of industry-standard frameworks and regulations (NIST, ISO 27001, GDPR, PCI-DSS, SOC2).
  • Experience working with GRC platforms and tools such as RSA Archer, ServiceNow GRC, MetricStream, or similar.
  • Hands-on experience in risk assessments, compliance audits, and policy implementation.
  • Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP) and their associated compliance challenges.
  • Strong analytical skills and a data-driven mindset for decision making.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to articulate technical concepts to business audiences.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Certifications such as CISA, CISM, CISSP, CRISC, or PMP.
  • Experience in automating compliance processes within Descopes pipelines.
  • Solid understanding of IT and security control frameworks (CIS Controls, MITRE ATT&CK).
  • Exposure to compliance monitoring of cloud-native environments.
  • Experience in regulatory environments (e.g., finance, healthcare, government).

Professional Attributes We Value

  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Ability to operate independently in a fast-paced environment
  • Strategic thinker with a continuous improvement mindset
  • Collaborative approach, building trust with cross-functional teams
  • Passion for keeping up to date with emerging cybersecurity and compliance trends

As a GRC Analyst in our cybersecurity services team, you will have the opportunity to influence risk-based decisions, improve compliance maturity, and protect our clients’ critical assets from regulatory and security risks. If you are driven by governance excellence and have a solid technical understanding of cybersecurity controls, we encourage you to apply.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at aswathi.asok@arttechgroup.com
summary: GRC Analyst to enhance risk management and compliance frameworks. Responsibilities include risk assessments, policy management, and GRC tool support. Requires 3+ years of experience.

job_description:
Junior Geophysicist - Fiber-optic Sensing & AI (Fresher)

We are seeking a motivated Junior Geophysicist (recent graduate) to dive into projects involving Distributed Acoustic Sensing (DAS), fiber‑optic sensor data, and Python‑driven AI analysis. You’ll work closely with geophysicists, data scientists, and engineers to drive data‑centric insights and support field deployments.

Key Responsibilities

  • Support data acquisition, preprocessing, and interpretation from fiber‑optic sensing systems (DAS/DTS).
  • Analyze large time‑series datasets using Python (NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib).
  • Collaborate with AI/ML experts to build models for signal classification, event detection, or anomaly identification.
  • Participate in field activities, including deploying sensors, monitoring systems, and validating datasets.
  • Document workflows, results, and technical insights clearly in reports or code comments.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Geophysics, Geoscience, Physics, Engineering, or related discipline.
  • Fundamental understanding of seismic wave behavior and fiber‑optic sensing principles.
  • Basic proficiency in Python and experience with data‑analysis libraries.
  • Interest in machine learning—any exposure to scikit‑learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch is a plus.
  • Excellent analytical thinking, communication skills, and collaborative mindset.

Preferred (Nice-to-Have)

  • Experience with signal processing, time‑series analysis, or seismic inversion methods.
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and Jupyter notebooks.
  • Willingness and physical ability to participate in occasional fieldwork and travel.

What You’ll Gain

  • Hands‑on experience at the intersection of geophysics, fiber‑optic sensing, and AI.
  • Mentorship from industry professionals and cross‑disciplinary collaboration.
  • Exposure to real‑world problems in energy, infrastructure, and environmental monitoring.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lakshmi@team.tranzmeo.com.

job_title: Computer Vision & Augmented Reality R&D Engineer
job_description:
Computer Vision & Augmented Reality R&D Engineer

Company: iBoson Innovations (P) Ltd Location: ACE 1, 3rd Floor, CDAC Building, Technopark Campus, Kazhakootam, Thiruvananthapuram, 695581 Website: http://www.iboson.io Closing Date: September 30, 2025 Job Published: September 21, 2025 Contact Email: career@ibosoninnov.com

Brief Description

We are seeking highly motivated R&D Engineers specializing in Computer Vision and Augmented Reality to design, prototype, and optimize next-generation visual computing solutions. The role involves pushing the boundaries of 3D perception, real-time tracking, and AR interaction through a combination of algorithm research, system design, and hands-on development.

Key Responsibilities

  • Research, develop, and prototype algorithms for 2D/3D computer vision, including feature detection, descriptor matching, pose estimation, and object recognition.
  • Build and optimize pipelines for 3D reconstruction, point cloud registration, and depth estimation using monocular, stereo, and LiDAR data.
  • Develop AR solutions leveraging ARCore, ARKit, and Unity, including plane detection, meshing, and spatial mapping.
  • Implement and evaluate feature matching and registration techniques (e.g., SIFT, LSD, SuperGlue, RANSAC-based methods) for robust object/scene understanding.
  • Integrate and optimize machine learning models (e.g., quantized and lightweight vision models) for mobile and embedded platforms.
  • Work across multiple platforms (C++, Python, Java, Swift) to bridge research prototypes with production-level applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to transform R&D outcomes into deployable solutions.

Preferred Skills

  • Strong background in Computer Vision, 3D Geometry, and Augmented Reality.
  • Proficiency in OpenCV, Open3D, Eigen, and feature-matching frameworks.
  • Hands-on experience with ARCore, ARKit, Unity, and real-time spatial computing.
  • Familiarity with point cloud processing, depth sensing, and reconstruction techniques.
  • Programming expertise in C++, Python, and at least one mobile platform language (Java/Kotlin for Android, Swift for iOS).
  • Knowledge of ML model optimization and quantization for resource-constrained environments.
  • Strong problem-solving and R&D mindset with the ability to prototype and iterate quickly.

Nice-to-Have

  • Experience with neural feature descriptors and transformer-based matching networks.
  • Background in SLAM, visual positioning systems, or optical flow methods.
  • Contributions to open-source CV/AR projects or research publications.

What We Offer

  • Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AR and CV research with real-world impact.
  • Collaborative environment where experimentation and innovation are encouraged.
  • Pathway to publish research, build prototypes, and shape next-gen AR systems.
  • Work on next-generation AR smart glasses.
summary: R&D Engineers sought for Computer Vision & AR roles. Develop next-gen visual computing solutions, focusing on 3D perception and real-time tracking.

Brief Description

We are looking for a proactive & highly skilled Technical Support Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services such as CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services

  • Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads.
  • Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and taking decisions based on the analysis.
  • Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools

  • Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues.
  • Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health.
  • Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation.
  • Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security

  • Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues.
  • Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic.
  • Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic.
  • Understanding service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols.
  • Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications.
  • Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains

  • Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging.
  • Understanding of Kubernetes concepts for managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues and related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines.
  • Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management

  • Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging.
  • Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication

  • Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents.
  • Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers.
  • Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for the deployment, configuration, performance tuning, monitoring, and troubleshooting of Odoo servers (both community and enterprise editions). You will also collaborate closely with the development and functional teams to ensure system availability, security, and scalability.

  • Set up and manage SSL certificates, reverse proxy (Nginx), and domain configurations.
  • Implement security best practices including firewall rules, fail2ban, and user access controls.

  • Strong hands-on experience with Linux (Ubuntu/Debian) server administration.

We are looking for a visionary and highly experienced Senior QA Manager with extensive expertise in quality engineering, automation strategy, and leading enterprise-scale systems. This role requires technical mastery, strategic thinking, and the ability to influence cross-functional teams to enhance test automation maturity across products, teams, and geographies. You will be responsible for the quality roadmap, designing robust automation ecosystems, and leading a high-performing QA organization to deliver world-class, secure, and scalable digital platforms.

Key Responsibilities

  • Quality Strategy & Roadmap: Define and drive a comprehensive QA automation vision and long-term roadmap across all product lines.
  • Leadership & Team Development: Build, scale, and lead a high-performing global QA organization focused on impactful automation.
  • Automation Architecture: Architect robust, enterprise-level automation frameworks for UI, API, Mobile, and Data layers.
  • Governance & Compliance: Establish and oversee standards for functional, performance, security, and compliance testing.
  • Cross-Functional Alignment: Collaborate with engineering, product, DevOps, compliance, and business teams to align quality initiatives with business objectives.
  • Test Maturity & Metrics: Define benchmarks for automation coverage, release confidence, and continuous improvement models.
  • Innovation & Best Practices: Champion new tools, methodologies, and emerging QA practices to enhance testing effectiveness.
  • CI/CD Integration: Seamlessly integrate automation into CI/CD pipelines for faster, more reliable releases.
  • Quality Reporting & Insights: Monitor and report key quality metrics, defect patterns, and incidents, implementing proactive measures.
  • Mentorship & Culture Building: Develop future QA leaders, mentor engineers, and foster a culture of innovation, accountability, and excellence.

Preferred Skills

  • 15+ years of experience in QA/testing, with a strong emphasis on test automation and at least 5+ years in senior leadership roles.
  • Proven track record of building automation teams and strategies from scratch in mid-to-large scale organizations.
  • Hands-on expertise with test automation tools/frameworks such as Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, Appium, Rest Assured, etc.
  • Proficiency in programming/scripting languages like Java, Python, JavaScript, or similar.
  • Strong understanding of Agile, DevOps, and Shift-Left testing methodologies.
  • Experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab CI.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Exposure to compliance/regulatory testing (PCI-DSS, SOC2, ISO 27001) is highly desirable.
  • Exceptional stakeholder management and communication skills, including executive-level reporting.
  • Domain expertise in Fintech, Banking, SaaS, or other regulated industries.
  • Experience with AI-driven testing, predictive quality analytics, or model-based testing.
  • ISTQB Advanced Certification or equivalent credentials.
  • Demonstrated ability to scale QA practices in multi-product or platform environments.

Why you will love working with us?

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Opportunity to make a meaningful impact across 10+ million users.
  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.
summary: Seeking a Senior QA Manager with 15+ years of experience to lead global QA efforts. Responsibilities include defining quality strategy, building automation frameworks, and mentoring teams.
